title: Is Durga Puja celebrated anywhere in Kota? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hi greetings from Being Home - Concept PGs/Hostel in Kota Durga pooja is a festival that is predominantly celebrated in North East India. In it is closest reality Durga pooja is celebrated in Bengali colony in CHAWANI ON 29TH September. In regard to Dussera, it happens in Dussera Maidan in CAD circle in Kota. The Ravan burning event happens tomorrw. Reach out to us for student Friendly discounts for hostels during this festival season. Do follow our puzzle series on Insta and FB for exiting prices Www.facebook.com/beinghomekota/ Regards Being Home Team
yaa it is celebrated very auspiciously everywhere in kota. There are some groups like patrika group and maheshwari samaj group and many more organize the GARBA nights every year at large scales.
